content: The Sundeck (open during the summer season) is located at the top of Royalton Park Avenue's tri-level rooftop and can hold up to 180 people with flexible seating. Great for soaking up some Vitamin D during the day and sipping a cool cocktail during the evening hours. The Sundeck serves up traditional and frozen drinks, like our classic Frosé cocktail, an extended beer menu fresh coconuts from CoCo & Co as well as delicious café bites.
